lead_paragraph: STIEFEL--Maurice B. on July 3, 2016. Beloved husband of Miriam Goldman, and the late Marcia Stiefel. Devoted father of Judith, Susan, and Michael. Loving stepfather of Fred, James, and William. Dear stepbrother of Richard and Eleanor. Proud grandfather of six. Maurie practiced intellectual property law for over forty years, founding his own firm which subsequently merged with Bryan Cave. An avid reader, sailor, chess player, with strong interests in psychology and music, he was active in retirement. Maurie taught and took courses at various institutions. He will be deeply missed. A celebration of his life will be held in the fall. Contributions in his memory can be made to Death with Dignity. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STIEFEL, MAURICE B
